transcript.text: Shalom Shalom Shalom well this is daniel
john lee with torah restoration
ministries websites ww spirit and tour
com it is the sixth day of the week of
preparation day for Shabbat friday
december the six it's the third day of
the ninth eber month and if it's
possible it's actually colder today than
it was yesterday it is freezing there
was snow and ice all over Portland when
i left my house today to go preach at
psu i got to psu at eleven o'clock this
morning because i needed to go talk to
the administration about some ideas of
what i could do to preach next week
during finals week without disturbing
the students and I think we reached a
good compromise today was the last
official full day of classes before went
to break this is my seventeenth day to
preach a psu since I restarted my
ministry at PSU a little over a month
ago Oh what an awesome day it was thank
you for your prayers I started preaching
about 1120 in the morning preached until
about one thirty in the afternoon so
good two hours although I was frozen by
the time i was done my crowd never got
over maybe 10 or 15 students the whole
day maybe 20 students at one point when
i was disputing with some some
hypocrites but never really got over 10
or 15 students because it was just so
frigid but i preached i actually was
able to preach the entire psalm 119
today all 170 + vs there was a man there
an older man i think he was homeless his
name's Marcus and I offered to take him
out to lunch sometime later after
Shabbat and please pray for him he's
coming under conviction of the spirit he
knows the Bible but he's a hypocrite he
he won't obey the entire Bible but he
knows it so pray for Marcus I believe
he's coming into a conviction even in
the handful of 10 or 15 students that
were there the whole day while I was
preaching which is a miracle because I
mean it is freezing the windchill factor
today is like it's got to be below zero
it is it is I see today very unusual for
Portland especially when it's still fall
but anyway I saw one woman with a you
know head cover hush and have had to
head covering she was covering her head
because it was so cold but I could see
the spirit of sobriety upon her face she
was coming into a conviction of sin
there are some other hecklers even
Andrew came out he was much more sober
much more sober like his whole attitude
had changed Andrew and then this other
arrogant ap is that i've contended with
for you know the last several days weeks
at psu and he was totally different as
well it was an amazing day the spirit of
yacht even though the crowd was only ten
or fifteen students the crip the Spirit
of God descended and I did have some
good one-on-one dialogues and
conversations with various students even
in the midst of that small crowd just on
various subjects mostly centering about
living holy the main topic of the day
for the two hours was the blood
atonement of Yahshua and then of course
this was my last official day at PSU in
terms of this is the last official day
of classes because next week is finals
I'll still be going to psu next week but
I think i'm going to be doing more
one-on-one witnessing and passing out my
cards and things like that because i
don't want to disturb the students while
they take their exams so this was like
sort of my last official day and it's
you know the 17th day and yash is
returning in 2017 which is kind of cool
but I blew my shofar eight times eight
means the new beginning because there is
a new beginning that's about to happen
when ya cast Satan from heaven down to
the earth it's going to be a new
beginning all right not a new beginning
a lot of people are looking forward to
but it'll be a new beginning and so I
did that and then even after i left i
decided to crank up my praise and
worship music really loud in my car and
I I circled back around to the park
blocks cranked up on my windows and just
blew out the shofar and as I did that
students came up to my car I even had a
couple Muslims that were just eager and
hungry for the truth and I gave them
some cards which was awesome earlier in
the day the one the one dispute I did
have was I had about three or four
Muslims they were about to punch me in
the face they got so angry because I
kept telling them that Muhammad was a
pedophile and I kept telling them that
he was a false prophet that he told
people to break the Torah I kept telling
and emphasizing that Yahshua is Yahweh
manifest in the flesh and that's got
them so angry and then I said if you
guys don't repent he always going to
give the Jews the power to nuke you
Muslims and you Muslims are going to be
eradicated off the face of the earth so
you better repent so that was that was
the one thing where things got a little
dicey but they backed off and the spirit
of you I was with me anyway it was a
great final day at PSU for the final
full
they have classes next week is finals
i'll be coming out but it won't be like
today it'll be more like one-on-one
witnessing and passing out my my cards
so anyway thank you for all your prayers
this is daniel john lee with tour
restoration ministries websites ww
spirit and torah calm it is the
preparation day for the Sabbath I've got
to now go prepare for Shabbat so yeah
bless and Shalom we will be meeting
tonight on skype at 5pm Pacific 8 p.m.
eastern we're having gradually more more
people starting to join again we got Ted
we got bogglingly got ANCA yesterday
Christian came back who's a young man
that lives here in Portland so slowly
but surely people are coming back to the
skype so I'm happy about that all of you
are invited we meet at 5pm Pacific 8
p.m. eastern for a time of joy prayer
praise worship feasting it is the
beginning of Shabbat tonight hallelujah
this is daniel john lee with tour
restoration ministries thank you for
your prayers I've run my race and I did
